chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall (xs ys : list IR) (x : IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (xs ++ [x]) (ys ++ [x])

Premises:
Inductive IR_equivalent : list IR -> list IR -> Prop := IR_equiv_nil : IR_equivalent [] [] | IR_equiv_cons : forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys) | IR_equiv_move : forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> good_move x y -> IR_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys) | IR_equiv_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list IR, IR_equivalent l1 l2 -> IR_equivalent l2 l3 -> IR_equivalent l1 l3 Arguments IR_equivalent (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_cons _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_move _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_trans (_ _ _)%list_scope
Inductive IR : Type := IRI : K -> IR | IRO : K -> IR | IRU : K -> IR
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
IR_equiv_cons : forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys)
Inductive IR_equivalent : list IR -> list IR -> Prop := IR_equiv_nil : IR_equivalent [] [] | IR_equiv_cons : forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys) | IR_equiv_move : forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> good_move x y -> IR_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys) | IR_equiv_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list IR, IR_equivalent l1 l2 -> IR_equivalent l2 l3 -> IR_equivalent l1 l3 Arguments IR_equivalent (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_cons _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_move _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_trans (_ _ _)%list_scope
IR_equiv_move : forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> good_move x y -> IR_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)
IR_equivalent_ind : forall P : list IR -> list IR -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> P (x :: xs) (x :: ys)) -> (forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> good_move x y -> P (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list IR, IR_equivalent l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> IR_equivalent l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list IR, IR_equivalent l l0 -> P l l0
IR_equivalent_sind : forall P : list IR -> list IR -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> P (x :: xs) (x :: ys)) -> (forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> good_move x y -> P (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list IR, IR_equivalent l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> IR_equivalent l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list IR, IR_equivalent l l0 -> P l l0
IR_equiv_app_head : forall l xs ys : list IR, IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (l ++ xs) (l ++ ys)
In_app_before : forall (A : Type) (xs ys : list A) (x y : A), In x xs -> ~ In y xs -> before x y (xs ++ y :: ys)
filter_dedup : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (pred : A -> bool) (xs : list A) (p : A) (ys : list A), pred p = false -> filter pred (dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ ys)) = filter pred (dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ p :: ys))
remove_partition : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A) (p : A) (ys : list A), remove A_eq_dec p (xs ++ p :: ys) = remove A_eq_dec p (xs ++ ys)
dedup_partition : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A) (p : A) (ys xs' ys' : list A), dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ p :: ys) = xs' ++ p :: ys' -> remove A_eq_dec p (dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ ys)) = xs' ++ ys'
StepDrop_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_drop net net' [(pDst p, inr out)] where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_dup net net' [(pDst p, inr out)] where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_async net net' [(pDst p, inr out)] where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)] where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- FailureParams ?P]
before_2_3_insert : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (x y a b : A), before a b (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> b <> x -> b <> y -> before a b (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs)
In_cons_2_3 : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (x y a : A), In a (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> In a (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs)
remove_not_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> remove A_eq_dec x xs = xs
subseq_2_3 : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (x y : A), subseq (xs ++ ys ++ zs) (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs)
StepFailureDiskOp_deliver : forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (do_name * do_msg)), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (do_pDst p) failed ->...-> step_failure_disk_ops (failed, net) (failed, net') [(do_pDst p, inr out)] where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
map_eq_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (xs ys : list B), map f l = xs ++ ys -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ l2 /\ map f l1 = xs /\ map f l2 = ys
step_drop_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]

remove_all_cons : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ys : list A) (a : A) (l : list A), remove_all A_eq_dec ys (a :: l) = remove_all A_eq_dec ys l /\ In a ys \/ remove_all A_eq_dec ys (a :: l) = a :: remove_all A_eq_dec ys l /\ ~ In a ys

step_failure_ind : forall P : list name * network -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- FailureParams ?P]

subseq_skip : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (xs ys : list A), subseq xs ys -> subseq xs (a :: ys)
